parse.title: The Pant-Hoot J.R.R. Tolkien Memorial Calendar 1975

wikitext.*:
[[Image:The Pant-Hoot J.R.R. Tolkien Memorial Calendar 1975.jpg|thumb]]

'''The Pant-Hoot J.R.R. Tolkien Memorial Calendar 1975''' was produced by [[Pant-Hoot Publications]] and was the first of the calendars by the [[American Tolkien Society]]. Illustrations are by [[Philip W. Helms]].

* 8.5 x 11 inches

{{title|italics}}
